body:
To be fair, I think we should acknowledge that liberals have a few additional “arguments”. 
Examples:

“You’re a racist”
“You’re a sexist”
“You’re a transphobe”
“You just can’t see your own privilege”
“That’s a right wing talking point”
“You’re a paid shill”
“You’re a Russian troll”

There may be three or four that I left out.

post.title: Doesn't get anymore average than this

body:
The supply and demand imbalance with regard to actual nazis is so hilarious to watch. When the first “Unite the Right” rally was held, the organizers deliberately tried to hide the fact that they were white nationalists, and tons of people showed up thinking it was just a conservative get together.

The media (and Reddit / social media) ran absolutely wild with this story. Every headline was about the resurgence of white nationalism. 

Then, fast forward a year, and the second rally is being planned. The media again goes into a frenzy. The Nazis are taking over! There are millions of white nationalists in America! The fabric of society is being torn apart! I had several acquaintances tell me that they thought that this could be the spark for a civil war. And I just fucking laughed.

Then the rally takes place. Keep in mind, the media has been covering this like crazy for a week, meaning that every legitimate white nationalist in the country is well aware that the event is taking place. After all that hysteria, around twelve pasty ass basement dwelling white dudes showed up. By contrast, thousands of counter protesters showed up. That was it. That was the whole thing.

And of fucking course that’s what happened. By the time the second rally took place, everybody knew that the organizers were white nationalists, so nobody showed up. And of course, nobody in the media was held accountable for fanning the flames of this fucking hoax. None of the retards who were totally sucked into the  story decided to reevaluate whether their chosen news source is really reliable. The entire machine just keeps chugging along, waiting for the next bullshit nonevent that it can spin into a nazi uprising.
body_html:
The supply and demand imbalance with regard to actual nazis is so hilarious to watch. When the first “Unite the Right” rally was held, the organizers deliberately tried to hide the fact that they were white nationalists, and tons of people showed up thinking it was just a conservative get together.

The media (and Reddit / social media) ran absolutely wild with this story. Every headline was about the resurgence of white nationalism.

Then, fast forward a year, and the second rally is being planned. The media again goes into a frenzy. The Nazis are taking over! There are millions of white nationalists in America! The fabric of society is being torn apart! I had several acquaintances tell me that they thought that this could be the spark for a civil war. And I just fucking laughed.

Then the rally takes place. Keep in mind, the media has been covering this like crazy for a week, meaning that every legitimate white nationalist in the country is well aware that the event is taking place. After all that hysteria, around twelve pasty ass basement dwelling white dudes showed up. By contrast, thousands of counter protesters showed up. That was it. That was the whole thing.

And of fucking course that’s what happened. By the time the second rally took place, everybody knew that the organizers were white nationalists, so nobody showed up. And of course, nobody in the media was held accountable for fanning the flames of this fucking hoax. None of the retards who were totally sucked into the story decided to reevaluate whether their chosen news source is really reliable. The entire machine just keeps chugging along, waiting for the next bullshit nonevent that it can spin into a nazi uprising.

parent.body: I was literally called a white supremacist on this very website today because I called someone a petulant child. It's become their go-to tactic because they're used to someone taking that person away when they use it.

post.title: Doesn't get anymore average than this

body: I saw the trans Keanu Chungus and to be honest, I’d make that my profile pic because it’s fucking hilarious! So I decided to look this guy up on Reddit, he seems to be unironic... Poe’s law in action
